group_1.textRight: What?!
Someone with a Witch's Kiss stole a@tanker truck?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, and we don't know where it is.@It's probably in a big, deserted area...
That's the kind of place where we encountered@the Witch before, at least.

group_1.textRight: If we don't act soon, they may use that tanker to@make poison gas and cause an awful disaster...
Hmm... So we need to narrow down the location.@Do you have any more details?

group_1.textLeft: Let me see - the people who got enthralled@must still be on the move.
The truck might be somewhere nearby.

group_1.textRight: It should be somewhere in Chuo Ward, then. Still, though, that's basically an office district...

group_1.textLeft: It might be difficult to find a vacant office building.
Oh, and you probably can't even park a@tanker truck inside one to begin with...

group_1.textRight: There are some other Magical Girls in Chuo Ward@who also are dealing with the Witches.
I'll ask them about it as well.
Oh, but before I go, I want to let you know@that you may hear from Touka later.
I also just had a meeting with Kyubey and@asked him about what's going on,
so we'll see what happens next...
I didn't realize so many Witches had@traveled through time from Mitakihara.
I'm pretty sure the reason we can't use the Grief@Seeds after beating the Witches this time...
...is cause we need to match the same number as@the amount of Witches that came to Kamihama.
That means we can't defeat more or less Witches@than that total, right?

group_1.textLeft: If those numbers don't match, it might@cause a paradox.
We also need the Grief Seeds we collect@to be in perfect condition.

group_1.textRight: Then why don't we just turn every Witch...
...that comes up around here into a Grief Seed?
...On second thought, we can't.
If we accidentally defeat the Witches that were@originally in Kamihama and add 'em to the pile,
we'll be sending Witches back to the past@that shouldn't be there.

group_1.textLeft: Furthermore, even if we defeat all the@Witches we find,
I doubt their amount will conform with@the number of those from the past...

group_1.textRight: Arrggh! I just can't see a clear goal in all this!
We have WAY too many problems on our hands!

group_1.textLeft: Still, if we let the Witches roam free, people@are bound to get hurt...
While it might cause some problems down the line,@let's just focus on defeating the Witches right now!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...! You're right, Madoka.
